sentences.sContent: A certain person, who shall remain nameless, forgot to lock the front door.
sentences.sCn: 某人忘了锁前门，名字我就不说了。

synos.tran: 不可名状的，难以形容的；匿名的

words.tran: 命名的；指定的；被指名的
命名；任命（name的过去分词）；称呼
命名，任命；指定；称呼；提名；叫出

trans.tranOther: used when you want to say that someone has done something wrong but without mentioning their name, especially to criticize them in a friendly way
